name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Phantom Blood
summary:
JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Phantom Blood is an action-adventure video game adaptation of Phantom Blood released for the PlayStation 2 by developer Anchor Inc. and publisher Bandai Namco Games on October 26, 2006.

This is the second game for the PS2 that is based on JoJo's Bizarre Adventure. It was released to coincide with the 20th anniversary of the series.
